item.description: Meetup for a picnic and outdoor games (byo picnic, drinks, maybe something to share) at the waterfront park for a lovely way to start the summer. At 2:30-3 PM we will head over to the deck AT MICHAEL'S HARBORSIDE where the fantastic reggae band Hot Like Fire will be playing on Sunday afternoons from 3-7 PM...this was alot of fun last year. A raindate will be posted if the weather doesn't look good.
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet in the park at the waterfront just past the Black Cow restaurant and everyone will be wearing a hat. Wear YOUR favorite hat!!!
item.why: it's a fun venue and afternoon.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Newburyport Summer Kick Off...
